title: Consent Context
description: Captures the user's consent state for data collection and processing purposes.

purposes.description: A map of consent purpose names to their granted/denied state (e.g. { "analytics": true, "marketing": false }).

method.description: The method by which consent was collected.

version.description: The version of the consent policy the user agreed to.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the consent was last updated.

gpcEnabled.description: Whether the Global Privacy Control (GPC) signal is enabled in the browser.

doNotTrack.description: Whether the Do Not Track (DNT) header is set in the browser.
